_sText:
My first map.

It is a relatively basic deathrun map, nothing too fancy, run in a straight line etc etc.

No buttons can be spammed, but be warned they have a 20sec reset time, so don't wait around.

If the CTs complete the map, both they and the Ts are teleported to a jump room, where they have to race to a final teleporter. From here there are 3 choices. Have fun checking them out.

Included in this map are 2 secrets at the end, nothing special, just something nice for the CTs.

I understand there are some problems with this map, including bad FPS at times, and will eventually work on a v2 of it, but that is not my primary focus at the moment.

EDIT:
V2 is almost complete:
new traps!
no more walls to block ts!
volumetric lighting!
hdr lighting!
new bonus areas!
more spawns!
trap fixes!
massive optimisation upgrades!

and:

NO MORE ORANGE TEXTURE.
